source_name: SIFMA 2025 Fixed Income Market Structure Compendium
author: SIFMA
content: Summarizes U.S. Treasury market structure: ~900B USD average daily volume, continued electronification, and migration to central clearing ahead of the September 2025 implementation deadline. Highlights data gaps in off-the-run liquidity and urges standardized post-trade transparency.
citation: SIFMA (2025) Fixed Income Market Structure Compendium

source_name: SEC withdraws appeal on Treasury dealer rule
author: Reuters
content: Reuters reports the SEC dropped its appeal after a court vacated the expanded Treasury dealer registration rule. Outcome: proprietary trading firms avoid automatic dealer status for now, reducing near-term capital and reporting requirements but leaving potential for rewritten rules later.
citation: Reuters (2025-02-20) SEC withdraws appeal on Treasury dealer rule
